page.title: 08WYMERS LODGE,MARLOW BOTTOM
page.content: {WYMERS LODGE}WAS BUILT JUST AFTER THE{ {FIRST WORLD WAR.}THE PRESENT OWNERS HAVE LIVED IN IT SINCE{WORLD WAR 11.} THE LODGE IS NOW A FARMHOUSE AND THE GROUNDS ARE NOW CROP FIELDS AND GRAZING LAND.THERE ARE ABOUT 120 HEAD OF CATTLE WHICH ARE ALL USED FOR BEEF.THE FIELDS ARE ALL{CORN,}EXCEPT FOR TWO,WHICH ARE{WHEAT.}THE FARMHOUSE HAD AN EXTENSION BUILT IN 1980,AND AN OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOL WAS BUILT FOUR YEARS EARLIER.THERE IS A PLOT OF WOODLAND CONSISTING MAINLY OF{BEECH {TREES.}A LONG TIME AGO MOST OF THE TREES WERE CUT DOWN FOR{CHAIR MAKING} BUT NOW ALL THE TREES HAVE{ {PRESERUATION ORDERS}WHICH EXPIRE IN 28 YEARS TIME.
